title: Hi there everyone?
author: Taylor25
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Taylor25 于 2016-11-12 13:37 编辑 
As you can see, I'm new here and posting this to get the reward.

Anyway, I just wish I could make some friends here, so let's roll.

P.S.: This little-pig medal is cute.

And I've got a new question, what does eleven(11, the number) mean to you guys?
It's just I've seen, like, all of you discussing about it

Problem Solved

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content:
11 means somebody is single(no girl friend or boy friend).
We have four '1's on november 11th so that day were called "the day of single peoples".
Somebody may glad they are not single so they say laugh at those people who are single.
And the team of single people will try to make them separate, and they are called "FFF".
